title: New: Four Tet – Locked
body:
With [Four Tet](http://soundcloud.com/four-tet)’s Fabric Live album just around the corner, a new previously unreleased single has been released as a taster. _Locked_ begins hollow and bare, and then settles in to a percussion loop, with Kieran Hebden (Four Tet) playing with sounds almost as he goes a along. At times it feels like a band jamming, it’s organic and explorative electronic music at its finest.

Stream below.

[Locked (TEXT011)](http://soundcloud.com/four-tet/locked-text011) by [Four Tet](http://soundcloud.com/four-tet)
